globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://*.hockeypickup.com https://*.blob.core.windows.net https://api.flickr.com; img-src 'self' https://*.blob.core.windows.net https://*.staticflickr.com data:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com
